--- title: "rumination" description: "Written for my junior college's 2020 publication, 'melancholia'." author: - name: Yeo Jing Ying url: https://nusyjying.github.io/ date: 04-05-2021 categories: [Poetry] image: rumi.jpg draft: false --- ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](rumi.jpg){width=70%} ::: ::: ## rumination i’m chasing the backs of our younger selves to lie to myself that we will never grow old and leave each other
i’m chasing the shadows of our great past so that i don’t have to blind myself with the light of the present
i’m chasing the last vestiges of our dying sunset so i could pretend that i don’t have to see the next sun rise again
as much as i know that the new world will give me something newer, i can never let go of all that the past has given me.
